resources.string: Permission declied and can\'t ask more.
Here are tom and jerry for you…
You will receive chocolates and icecream on each section and exercise completion. So learn and play with us. We together will have so much fun.
Spot the difference among left and right image.
Your mom gave 1 chocolate to you.
Dad also gave 1 chocolate to you.
Your mom gave 1 chocolate to you. And your dad also gave 1 chocolate to you. Now, you have total 2 chocolate.
Your mom gave 2 chocolates to you.
Your mom gave 2 chocolates to you. Then you ate one. Now, you have only 1 chocolate.
Your mom gave 2 egg rolls to you.
Your dad then cut both rolls in half.
Your mom gave 2 egg rolls to you. Then your dad cut both rolls in half. Now, you have 4 egg rolls.
Repeat with me. A for apple
Few important points about plants are-
Plants are source of food for humans as well as other species.
The air we breath consists of 78% nitrogen and 21% oxygon. plants produce oxygon in atmosphere.
Plants provide many products for human use, such as firewood, timber, fibers, medicines, dyes, pesticides, oils, and rubber.
Plants create habitats for many organisms. A single tree may provide food and shelter to many species of insects, worms, small mammals, birds, and reptiles.
Many herbs are used in medicine.
Many fragrances used in perfumes are actually plants scent.

Plants are source of food for humans as well as other species.The air we breath consists of 78% nitrogen and 21% oxygon. plants produce oxygon in atmosphere. Plants provide many products for human use, such as firewood, timber, fibers, medicines, dyes, pesticides, oils, and rubber. Plants create habitats for many organisms. A single tree may provide food and shelter to many species of insects, worms, small mammals, birds, and reptiles. Many herbs are used in medicine. Many fragrances used in perfumes are actually plants scent.
Some important points about animals are-
Animals have been source of food for humans from the beginning.
Animals eat plants as well as other animals.
Elephants have a specific alarm call that means “human”.
At birth, a panda is smaller than a mouse and weighs about four ounces.
Cows can sleep standing up, but they can only dream lying down.
One species of jellyfish is immortal. It can revert back to its child state after having become sexually mature, and therefore never dies.

Animals have been source of food for humans from the beginning. Animals eat plants as well as other animals. Elephants have a specific alarm call that means “human”. At birth, a panda is smaller than a mouse and weighs about four ounces. Cows can sleep standing up, but they can only dream lying down. One species of jellyfish is immortal. It can revert back to its child state after having become sexually mature, and therefore never dies.
Few important facts about humon body-
Our mouth produces about one litre of saliva each day!.
Our brain is sometimes more active when we are asleep than when we are awake.
Our left lung is about 10 percent smaller than our right one.
Babies do not shed tears until they are at least one month old.
The human heart beats more than three billion times in an average lifespan.
Human teeth are just as strong as shark teeth.

Our mouth produces about one litre of saliva each day!. Our brain is sometimes more active when we are asleep than when we are awake. Our left lung is about 10 percent smaller than our right one. Babies do not shed tears until they are at least one month old. The human heart beats more than three billion times in an average lifespan. Human teeth are just as strong as shark teeth.
The environment is the surrounding where we live and survive.
The environment comprises all the natural materials, living, non-living things.
A clean environment is essential for the existence of all living beings.
Everyone should give priority to the save the environment.
One should use the products that can recycle. Also, everyone should encourage others to do the same thing.
Everyone should believe that it is their duty to save plants and trees. Avoid using plastic to protect the environment.

The environment is the surrounding where we live and survive. The environment comprises all the natural materials, living, non-living things. A clean environment is essential for the existence of all living beings. Everyone should give priority to the save the environment. One should use the products that can recycle. Also, everyone should encourage others to do the same thing. Everyone should believe that it is their duty to save plants and trees. Avoid using plastic to protect the environment.
How many times human heart beats in a single lifetime?
Congratulations for completing the exercise. We are delivering chocolates at your doorstep shortly.
